column4: how do you see what video driver you're using in 9.04? xorg.conf doesn't contain anything useful
glxinfo or xdpyinfo may be of help
do you think that if the [OpenGL version string] is "1.4 Mesa 7.4
would that mean that i'm running the generic mesa drivers?
i have no idea, sorry. try grepping for driver names. also, if you haven't modified your xorg.conf, X -configure may be revealing
